flagsdescription.title: 352.nab Approved Portability Flags
flagsdescription.header: This is the complete set of approved portability flags for 352.nab.
flagsdescription.flag: Tells benchmark not to use perflib. Must be set for SPEC run and is set in object.pm.
Setting this macro will cause vector reduction with OpenMP to be single- threaded (as it is when using MPI and ScaLAPACK). Set in object.pm for valid SPEC run.
